name: MediaSearch
desc: A description of the media items the user wants to play, add to a playlist, or express a preference for.

items.name: mediaName
items.desc: The name of the media item.

items.name: artistName
items.desc: The creator or performer of the media item.

items.name: albumName
items.desc: The album that contains the media item.

items.name: mediaType
items.desc: The type of media the user wants.

items.name: genreNames
items.desc: Genres that apply to this media item. These are the same genres as those at genreNames.

items.name: moodNames
items.desc: Feelings that describe the media item the user wants, such as happy or focused.

items.name: releaseDate
items.desc: The date of the media itemâ€™s first publication, or a period of time.

items.name: sortOrder
items.desc: The prioritization to apply to search results.

items.name: reference
items.desc: An indicator of whether the client is playing this media item.

items.name: mediaIdentifier
items.desc: The identifier for a specific media item.
